content: this design is named in fond memory of peter cundall peter was the much loved host and presenter of gardening australia for over 19 years his love and enthusiasm for gardening and growing your own food was genuine and infectious at the end of each episode peter s catchphrase for signing off was that s your bloomin lot always delivered with a cheeky grin and often with dirty hands these stranded colourwork socks are worked toe up with a rounded wedge toe and with a heel flap and gusset the instructions for the construction of the socks are written and the colourwork pattern is both written and charted a low vision accessible version of this pattern are also available this version includes 24 point arial all black text no italics no columns or tables and fully written instructions there are charts included but the charts are not needed to complete the pattern thank you to rannapiiga1 elchkitty schmuckkoerbchen gwenoveva shahmallow and other testers a huge thanks also to condichick yarnymama and yalta for their ongoing valued advice guidance feedback and encouragement
